## StepNode class

Step function (Heaviside step)

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class StepNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns 0 if x &lt; edge, otherwise 1. Useful for creating hard thresholds. Both inputs must be the same type (float, vec2, vec3, or vec4). Component-wise for vectors.
